title: Shap10r: A Logic and Deduction Puzzle Game
description: Challenge your mind with this unique blend of Wordle™ and Mastermind® gameplay mechanics
gameExperience: Test your deduction skills by uncovering hidden shape-color combinations in this engaging puzzle game!
startAdventure: Begin your puzzle-solving journey with Shap10r:
fullscreenTip: Click on the game area to start playing. Use the fullscreen button for a better experience.
quickGuide: Here's a quick guide to get you started:
step1Description: Choose five unique shape-color combinations from the grid of 24 options
step2Description: Green outlines show correct Shaplors in the right position, yellow indicates right Shaplor but wrong position
step3Description: Consider Shaplor values (shape + color) to deduce the correct combinations
step4Description: Use process of elimination to crack the code within 10 guesses
feature1Description: Randomly assigned shape and color values make each game unique
feature2Description: Choose between Normal Mode (sorted values) and Hard Mode (unsorted values)
feature3Description: Earn points for correct placements and bonus points for solving quickly
feature4Description: Clear visual feedback and user-friendly controls
reason1: Enhance critical thinking and pattern recognition skills through engaging gameplay
reason2: Free to play and accessible across all devices with no download required
reason3: Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages who enjoy logical challenges
faq1Answer: Shap10r is a challenging puzzle game that combines elements of Wordle™ and Mastermind®, where players use logic to uncover hidden shape-color combinations.
faq2Question: Do I need to install anything to play Shap10r?
faq2Answer: No, Shap10r runs directly in your web browser and is completely free to play.
faq3Question: Can I play Shap10r on mobile devices?
faq3Answer: Yes, Shap10r is fully optimized for mobile devices and playable on any modern web browser.
faq4Answer: Shap10r features dynamic value assignments, multiple difficulty modes, and combines visual pattern recognition with numerical strategy.
seoTitle: Shap10r: A Logic and Deduction Puzzle Game
seoDescription: Challenge your mind with this unique blend of Wordle™ and Mastermind® gameplay mechanics in a free-to-play puzzle experience!
keywords: Shap10r, puzzle game, logic game, deduction game, Wordle, Mastermind, brain training, strategy game

double-shap10r.title: Double Shap10r
double-shap10r.description: Challenge yourself with two simultaneous Shap10r puzzles. Use shared shapes and colors to solve both number combinations at once in this mind-bending variant of the classic game.
double-shap10r.shortDescription: Dual puzzle solving with shared resources

feature1.title: Dual Game Boards
feature1.description: Solve two independent Shap10r puzzles simultaneously using a shared pool of shapes

feature2.title: Strategic Planning
feature2.description: Carefully manage shape usage between both boards to optimize your solutions

feature3.title: Enhanced Challenge
feature3.description: Double the puzzle complexity with interconnected gameplay mechanics

feature4.title: Shared Resources
feature4.description: Use the same shapes and colors across both boards for unique strategic depth

howToPlay.step1: Select shapes and colors from the shared selection area
howToPlay.step2: Place pieces on either board to work towards their target numbers
howToPlay.step3: Plan your moves carefully as shapes used on one board affect availability for the other
howToPlay.step4: Complete both puzzles within the allowed attempts to win

seo.title: Double Shap10r | Dual Board Number Puzzle Game
seo.description: Challenge your mind with Double Shap10r, featuring two simultaneous puzzle boards sharing shapes and colors. Strategic dual-board gameplay for enhanced puzzle solving.
seo.keywords: Double Shap10r, dual puzzle, number game, logic game, strategy game, shape matching, color matching

faq1.question: How is Double Shap10r different from regular Shap10r?
faq1.answer: Double Shap10r features two game boards that share the same pool of shapes and colors, requiring strategic planning to solve both puzzles simultaneously.

faq2.question: Do both boards need to be completed together?
faq2.answer: Yes, you must solve both puzzles within the allowed attempts, managing your shape selections carefully between the two boards.

faq3.question: Is it more difficult than regular Shap10r?
faq3.answer: Yes, managing two boards with shared resources adds an extra layer of strategy and complexity to the game.

faq4.question: Are there different modes available?
faq4.answer: Like regular Shap10r, you can play in Normal Mode with sorted values or Hard Mode with unsorted values on both boards.

game.fullscreenTip: Press F11 or click the fullscreen button for the best experience

game.title: Play SHAP10R GAME
game.description: Shap10r combines Wordle™ and Mastermind® mechanics. Match five Shaplors with the correct values.
game.solvedPuzzle: You solved the puzzle in {tries} tries!
